cast.overview: When a lively young family moves in next door, grumpy widower Otto Anderson meets his match in a quick-witted, pregnant woman named Marisol, leading to an unlikely friendship that turns his world upside down.
cast.title: A Man Called Otto

details.biography: Christiana Emisan Willow Montoya is an American film and television actress based in Los Angeles, born on February 17, 2013 in Irvine, California. Montoya started acting at the age of six, and played the role of Abby in The Guilty (2021).
details.name: Christiana Montoya
